sentences.en: The photographs were prominently displayed on her desk.
sentences.cn: 几张照片摆在她桌子上显眼的位置。

sentences.en: Olive oil and garlic feature prominently in his recipes.
sentences.cn: 橄榄油和大蒜在他的食谱中显得很重要。

sentences.en: Human rights violations figured prominently in the report.
sentences.cn: 侵犯人权出现在报告中的显要位置。
